SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Interaktionen')), 'Interaktionen')
FROM(
SELECT 'Interaktionen' as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
LIMIT 1
)

FROM(
SELECT 'Aktive Nutzer:innen' as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
LIMIT 1
)

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline_small - CHAR_LENGTH('Pot. Reichweite')), 'Pot. Reichweite')
FROM(
SELECT 'Pot. Reichweite' as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
LIMIT 1
)

FROM(

FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
LIMIT 1
)

  "time" AS "time",

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_big - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(Follower as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(Follower) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM(
SELECT 
followers AS Follower
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
  WHERE profileId = $profileID 
  AND time = (SELECT MAX(time) FROM  `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook` WHERE profileId = $profileID AND followers>0
  AND DATE(time) = "$FollowersTimeRangeLastDay")
  --AND last_update = (SELECT MAX(last_update) FROM  `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook` WHERE profileId = $profileID) 

)

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

panels.description: Inhaltsbezogene Daten: Nur Inhalte, die im ausgewählten Zeitraum veröffentlicht wurden, sind berücksichtigt.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_big - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(summe as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(summe) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM
(
SELECT
  sum(IFNULL(post_reactions_by_type_total_like	+ post_reactions_by_type_total_love	+ 
  post_reactions_by_type_total_wow + post_reactions_by_type_total_haha + 
  post_reactions_by_type_total_sorry	+ post_reactions_by_type_total_anger + 
  post_activity_by_action_type_share + post_activity_by_action_type_comment,0)) as summe
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsightsOwnPosts`
WHERE profileId = $profileID
AND $zeitraum
)

panels.description: Inhaltsbezogene Daten: Nur Inhalte, die im ausgewählten Zeitraum veröffentlicht wurden, sind berücksichtigt.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(ROUND(summe) as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(summe) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM
(
SELECT 
  (sum(a.post_reactions_by_type_total_like	+ a.post_reactions_by_type_total_love	+ 
  a.post_reactions_by_type_total_wow + a.post_reactions_by_type_total_haha + 
  a.post_reactions_by_type_total_sorry	+ a.post_reactions_by_type_total_anger + 
  a.post_activity_by_action_type_share + a.post_activity_by_action_type_comment) / MAX(b.uniquePosts) ) as summe
FROM ( SELECT * FROM
  `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsightsOwnPosts`
WHERE profileId = $profileID
  AND $zeitraum)
  as a,
  --- collect number of unique posts
  (
    SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT externalId) as uniquePosts
    FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsightsOwnPosts`
    WHERE profileId = $profileID 
    AND $zeitraum
     AND post_impressions_unique IS NOT NULL
  ) as b
  )

panels.description: Inhaltsbezogene Daten: Nur Inhalte, die im ausgewählten Zeitraum veröffentlicht wurden, sind berücksichtigt.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(page_engaged_users as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(page_engaged_users as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM
(SELECT 
ROUND(SUM(a.post_engaged_users) / MAX(b.uniquePosts) ,0) as page_engaged_users
  FROM 
  -- get engaged users in time range
  (SELECT post_engaged_users
  FROM ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsightsOwnPosts
  WHERE profileId = $profileID 
  AND $zeitraum
) AS a,

-- get number of unique posts
    (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT externalId) as uniquePosts
    FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsightsOwnPosts`
    WHERE profileId = $profileID 
    AND $zeitraum
    AND post_impressions_unique IS NOT NULL
  ) as b
)

panels.description: Profilbezogene Daten: Alle Inhalte sind berücksichtigt.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(page_impressions_unique as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(page_impressions_unique) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM
(
SELECT
  ROUND(SUM(a.page_impressions_unique) / ${day_count:value}) as page_impressions_unique
  FROM
  -- get page impressions
  (SELECT page_impressions_unique
  FROM ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsights
  WHERE profileId = $profileID 
  AND $zeitraum
  )
  AS a
  )

panels.description: Profilbezogene Daten: Alle Inhalte sind berücksichtigt.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_big - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(Videostarts as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(Videostarts) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM
(
SELECT 
  SUM(page_video_views_10s) AS Videostarts 
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsights`
WHERE profileId = $profileID 
AND $zeitraum
)

panels.description: Profilbezogene Daten: Alle Inhalte sind berücksichtigt.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(Videostarts as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(Videostarts) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM
(
SELECT ROUND(AVG(page_video_views_10s_day)) as Videostarts
FROM
`ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsights`
WHERE profileId = $profileID 
AND $zeitraum
  )

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(Posts as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(Posts) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM
(
SELECT 
COUNT( distinct externalId) as Posts
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsightsOwnPosts`
  WHERE profileId = $profileID 
  AND $zeitraum
    )

SELECT a.followers - b.followers as followersChange,
FROM (
  SELECT followers
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
  WHERE $profileID = profileId
  and followers > 0
  and EXTRACT(date from time) = "$FollowersTimeRangeLastDay"


) as a,
 (
  SELECT followers
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
  WHERE $profileID = profileId
  AND EXTRACT(DATE from time) = DATE(TIMESTAMP('${__from:date}'), "Europe/Berlin")
) as b

panels.description: Inhaltsbezogene Daten: Nur Inhalte, die im ausgewählten Zeitraum veröffentlicht wurden, sind berücksichtigt.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(page_impressions_unique as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(page_impressions_unique) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", ".")) as page_impressions_unique FROM 
(
SELECT 
  ROUND(SUM(a.post_impressions_unique) / (MAX(b.uniquePosts)),0) as page_impressions_unique
  FROM 
  -- get engaged users
  (SELECT post_impressions_unique
  FROM ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsightsOwnPosts
  WHERE profileId = $profileID 
  AND $zeitraum
) AS A,
-- get number of unique posts
    (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT externalId) as uniquePosts
    FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsightsOwnPosts`
    WHERE profileId = $profileID 
    AND $zeitraum
    AND post_impressions_unique IS NOT NULL
  ) as b
)

panels.description: Inhaltsbezogene Daten: Nur Inhalte, die im ausgewählten Zeitraum veröffentlicht wurden, sind berücksichtigt.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(Videostarts as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(Videostarts) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM
(SELECT ROUND(SUM(ownVideos.total_video_10s_views) / COUNT(ownVideos.externalId)) AS Videostarts FROM
(SELECT 
  *
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsightsOwnPosts`
WHERE profileId = $profileID 
AND $zeitraum
) as ownPosts, 
(SELECT 
  *
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsightsOwnVideos`
WHERE profileId = $profileID
AND NOT(title ="") 
) as ownVideos 
WHERE ownPosts.objectId = ownVideos.externalId
)

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(ARD_Facebook_Score as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(ARD_Facebook_Score) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM
(
SELECT ROUND(a.Follower/1000 + b.interactions/10) as ARD_Facebook_Score
FROM
(SELECT 
followers AS Follower
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
  WHERE profileId = $profileID 
  AND time = (SELECT MAX(time) FROM  `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook` WHERE profileId = $profileID)) as a,
  (SELECT 
(ROUND (AVG(ownPostsLikes + ownPostsLove + ownPostsWow + ownPostsHaha + ownPostsSad + ownPostsAngry + ownPostsShares + ownPostsComments))) AS interactions
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
  WHERE profileId = $profileID 
  AND $zeitraum
  ) as b
)

options.content: Legende:  🖼️ = Bild    🎥 = Video    🔗 = Link    📕 = Album    📄 = Status

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT 
  post_reactions_by_type_total_anger,
post_reactions_by_type_total_sorry,
post_reactions_by_type_total_haha,
post_reactions_by_type_total_like,
post_reactions_by_type_total_wow,
post_reactions_by_type_total_love,
post_activity_by_action_type_share,
post_activity_by_action_type_comment,
post_impressions_unique,
post_impressions_fan_unique,
post_engaged_users,
link, 
message,
time,
  CONCAT(REPLACE(FORMAT("%.1f", SAFE_DIVIDE((post_reactions_by_type_total_anger +
post_reactions_by_type_total_sorry + 
post_reactions_by_type_total_haha +
post_reactions_by_type_total_like +
post_reactions_by_type_total_wow + 
post_reactions_by_type_total_love +
post_activity_by_action_type_share +
post_activity_by_action_type_comment) * 100, post_impressions_unique)), '.', ','), "%") AS interations_rate_formatted,
type, 
time,
  CASE 
    WHEN type = 'Video' AND post_video_length = 0
    THEN 'Link' 
    ELSE type
  END AS Typ
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsightsOwnPosts`
WHERE profileId = $profileID 
AND $zeitraum
--AND NOT(message = "")
ORDER BY post_engaged_users DESC

SELECT ownPosts.time as Datum, ownVideos.* FROM
(SELECT 
  time,
  objectId,
  CASE 
    WHEN type = 'Video' AND post_video_length = 0
    THEN 'Link' 
    ELSE type
  END AS Typ
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsightsOwnPosts`
WHERE profileId = $profileID 
AND $zeitraum
--AND NOT(message = "")
) as ownPosts, 
(SELECT 
  total_video_10s_views,
total_video_views,
total_video_views_by_distribution_type_page_owned,
total_video_views_by_distribution_type_shared,
total_video_avg_time_watched,
total_video_view_total_time,
total_video_views_by_distribution_type_page_owned,
description, 
link,
live_status,
externalId,
FORMAT("%02d:%02d", CAST(FLOOR(length/60) as INT), mod(CAST(length as INT),60)) as length_formatted
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsightsOwnVideos`
WHERE profileId = $profileID
AND NOT(title ="") 
) as ownVideos 

WHERE ownPosts.objectId = ownVideos.externalId
ORDER BY ownVideos.total_video_10s_views DESC

options.content:
# 📊 Hinweise

- Anteil Videostarts im eigenen Feed: Auf Basis Videostarts ab 3 Sek. 
- Die Interaktionen enthalten auch die Interaktionen in Shared Posts.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

query.rawSql:
SELECT a.LRA
FROM (
  SELECT DISTINCT LRA FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles`
  WHERE facebookID != 0
) as a
ORDER BY (
  CASE
    WHEN REGEXP_CONTAINS(LOWER("${__user.email}"), LOWER(a.LRA))
    THEN 1
    ELSE 0
  END
) DESC

SELECT a.profile 
FROM 
(SELECT profile FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` WHERE LRA = '$LRA' AND facebookId != 0) as a,
(SELECT  Profil_FB FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.default-settings` WHERE LRA = '$LRA') as b
ORDER BY( 
CASE WHEN a.profile = b.Profil_FB THEN 1
ELSE 2
END
), a.profile ASC

SELECT 
CASE MAX(last_update)
  WHEN NULL THEN "N/A"
  ELSE FORMAT_DATETIME("%d.%m.%Y | %H:%M Uhr", DATETIME(MAX(last_update),"Europe/Berlin"))
  END
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
WHERE profileId = $profileID
SELECT CAST(facebookID AS STRING) FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` WHERE profile = '''$Profil'''

list.name: ZeitraumNew
list.query: EXTRACT(DATE from time) BETWEEN DATE($__from) AND DATE(${__to})

query.rawSql:
--SELECT
--    COUNT(distinct time)
--    FROM Quintly.facebookInsights
--        WHERE
--    CASE WHEN (EXTRACT(HOUR from TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}')) = 23 AND EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}')) = 59 AND EXTRACT(SECOND FROM TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}')) = 59) THEN
--    DATE(time) between DATE_ADD(DATE('${__from:date:iso}', "Europe/Berlin"),INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND  DATE('${__to:date:iso}', "Europe/Berlin")
 --   ELSE   DATE(time) between DATE('${__from:date:iso}', "Europe/Berlin") AND  DATE('${__to:date:iso}', "Europe/Berlin")
  --  END ;
WITH number_of_days AS(SELECT
    COUNT(distinct time) as c_day
    FROM Quintly.facebookInsights
    WHERE
    CASE WHEN EXTRACT(DATE FROM TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}')) >= CURRENT_DATE("Europe/Berlin") THEN
    (EXTRACT(DATE from DATETIME(time, "Europe/Berlin")) BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE_SUB("$HeuteDatum", INTERVAL 1 DAY))
    ELSE   (EXTRACT(DATE from DATETIME(time, "Europe/Berlin")) BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin"))
    END)
 
 
 SELECT CASE
 
       --  case: "Last 24 HOURS "
    WHEN DATE('${__from:date:iso}', "Europe/Berlin") >= CURRENT_DATE("Europe/Berlin")  OR TIMESTAMP_DIFF(TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}'), TIMESTAMP('${__from:date:iso}'), HOUR) = 24 AND EXTRACT(DAY FROM DATETIME('${__from:date:iso}', "Europe/Berlin")) != EXTRACT(DAY FROM DATETIME('${__to:date:iso}', "Europe/Berlin")) OR TIMESTAMP_DIFF(TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}'), TIMESTAMP('${__from:date:iso}'), MINUTE) < 1439
    THEN CAST(1 AS STRING)
    ELSE CAST(c_day as STRING)
    END
    FROM number_of_days

current.text: (EXTRACT(DATE from DATETIME(time, "Europe/Berlin")) BETWEEN DATE('2024-07-26T11:07:12.959Z', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE_SUB("2024-08-02", INTERVAL 1 DAY))
current.value: (EXTRACT(DATE from DATETIME(time, "Europe/Berlin")) BETWEEN DATE('2024-07-26T11:07:12.959Z', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE_SUB("2024-08-02", INTERVAL 1 DAY))

query.rawSql:
SELECT CASE 

       --  case: "Last 24 HOURS "
    WHEN DATE('${__from:date:iso}', "Europe/Berlin") >= CURRENT_DATE("Europe/Berlin")  OR TIMESTAMP_DIFF(TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}'), TIMESTAMP('${__from:date:iso}'), HOUR) = 24 AND EXTRACT(DAY FROM DATETIME('${__from:date:iso}', "Europe/Berlin")) != EXTRACT(DAY FROM DATETIME('${__to:date:iso}', "Europe/Berlin")) OR TIMESTAMP_DIFF(TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}'), TIMESTAMP('${__from:date:iso}'), MINUTE) < 1439
    THEN """(EXTRACT(DATE from DATETIME(time, "Europe/Berlin"))  = DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE,INTERVAL 1 DAY))"""
    -- case: CURRENT_DATE()
    WHEN EXTRACT(DATE FROM TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}')) >= CURRENT_DATE("Europe/Berlin") 
    THEN  """(EXTRACT(DATE from DATETIME(time, "Europe/Berlin")) BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE_SUB("$HeuteDatum", INTERVAL 1 DAY))"""
    ELSE  """(EXTRACT(DATE from DATETIME(time, "Europe/Berlin")) BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin"))"""

    END

SELECT CASE 
-- case: last x<24 hours
    WHEN TIMESTAMP_DIFF(TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}'), TIMESTAMP('${__from:date:iso}'), HOUR) = 24 AND EXTRACT(DAY FROM DATETIME('${__from:date:iso}', "Europe/Berlin")) != EXTRACT(DAY FROM DATETIME('${__to:date:iso}', "Europe/Berlin")) OR TIMESTAMP_DIFF(TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}'), TIMESTAMP('${__from:date:iso}'), MINUTE) < 1439
    THEN   DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE,INTERVAL 1 DAY)
-- SECOND case: today or bigger
    WHEN EXTRACT(DATE FROM TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}')) >= CURRENT_DATE("Europe/Berlin") 
    THEN DATE_SUB("$HeuteDatum", INTERVAL 1 DAY)
ELSE DATE_SUB(DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin"), INTERVAL 0 DAY)
END

SELECT CASE 
-- case: last x<24 hours
    WHEN TIMESTAMP_DIFF(TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}'), TIMESTAMP('${__from:date:iso}'), HOUR) = 24 AND EXTRACT(DAY FROM DATETIME('${__from:date:iso}', "Europe/Berlin")) != EXTRACT(DAY FROM DATETIME('${__to:date:iso}', "Europe/Berlin")) OR TIMESTAMP_DIFF(TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}'), TIMESTAMP('${__from:date:iso}'), MINUTE) < 1439
    THEN   FORMAT_DATE("%d.%m.%y",DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE,INTERVAL 1 DAY))
-- SECOND case: today or bigger
    WHEN EXTRACT(DATE FROM TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}')) >= CURRENT_DATE("Europe/Berlin") 
    THEN FORMAT_DATE("%d.%m.%y",DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE("Europe/Berlin"), INTERVAL 1 DAY))
ELSE FORMAT_DATE("%d.%m.%y",DATE_SUB(DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin"), INTERVAL 0 DAY))
END

SELECT CASE CONTAINS_SUBSTR("""${zeitraum}""", "DATE_ADD")
WHEN True  THEN "# Hinweis: Für den ausgewählten Zeitraum liegen keine Daten vor. Um Daten auswerten zu können, bitte gestern oder größere Zeiträume auswählen."
ELSE """## Der ausgewertete Zeitraum lautet: $fromDay - $toDay """
END
